newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Primetown declares 75 pct stock dividend.
newsitem.headline: Primetown declares 75 pct stock dividend.

text.p: Condominium developer Primetown Property Group Inc said on Thursday its board had approved a 75 percent stock dividend to be given to shareholders as of March 26.
The company said the record date was set earlier this year but board approval was delayed until this week. No reason was given for the delay in the approval.
In a statement, Primetown also said it planned to increase its authorised capital stock to 1.75 billion pesos from one billion pesos.
The stock dividend and the capital increase still need the ratification of its shareholders.
The company said it posted a net income of 661 million pesos in 1996, up almost 100 percent from 332 million pesos registered the previous year.
